snippet.title: 『Sofia in Exchange for Lies』trailer
snippet.description:
MUTAN and storynote Announced Completely New Mystery Adventure Game "Sofia in Exchange for Lies"🦋
The game is scheduled to be released in the spring of 2025.

“I killed him, but it wasn’t really me...”
Your guesses will determine the fate of the five personalities that lie dormant inside Sofia...

ーーー

Steam page here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3326660
Remember to Wishlist!

Official page: https://sofia.mutan.co.jp/
Official X: https://x.com/SofiaLies_PR

ーーー
『#SofiainExchangeforLies』
Platform: Steam🄬
Release Date: Spring 2025
Genre: Mystery Adventure
Player(s): 1
Supported Languages: Japanese / English / Simplified Chinese
Price: TBD

Character Design:Hiro Kiyohara
Cast:Aoi Hinata
